00010 static const Real PI = 4.0*atan( 1.0 );
00011 static const Real TWO_PI = 2.0 * PI;
00012 static const Real HALF_PI = 0.5 * PI;
00013 static const Real INV_PI = 1.0 / PI;
00014 static const Real INV_TWO_PI = 1.0 / TWO_PI;
00015 static const Real DEG_TO_RAD = PI / 180.0;
00016 static const Real RAD_TO_DEG = 180.0 / PI;
00017 static const Real QUARTER_PI = ( Real ) ( PI / 4.0 );
00018 static const Real EIGHTH_PI = ( Real ) ( PI / 8.0 );
00019 static const Real PI_SQUARED = ( Real ) ( PI * PI );
00020 static const Real PI_INVERSE = ( Real ) ( 1.0 / PI );
00021 static const Real PI_OVER_180 = ( Real ) ( PI / 180 );
00022 static const Real PI_DIV_180 = ( Real ) ( 180 / PI );

00063 //******************************************************************************
00064 //
00065 // bicubic evaluation
00066 //
00067 // X(u,v) = [v^3 v^2 v^1] * Cx * [u^3 u^2 u^1]^T
00068 //

00077         Real afG[4][4],
